万境: (ばんきょう) - all places; all circumstances
万夫不当: (ばんぷふとう) - (yoji) being a match for thousands; being a mighty warrior (combatant)
万字: (まんじ) - swastika (esp. a counterclockwise swastika as a Buddhist symbol); fylfot; gammadion
万寿菊: (マンジュギク) - French marigold (Tagetes patula)
万尋: (ばんじん) - 10000 fathoms; great depth; great height
万尋の谷: (ばんじんのたに) - bottomless ravine; abyss
万屋: (よろずや) - general merchant; Jack of all trades
万已むを得なければ: (ばんやむをえなければ) - if necessary; when unavoidable
万巻: (まんがん) - many scrolls; many books
万年: (まんねん) - ten thousand years; eternity
万年候補: (まんねんこうほ) - ever unsuccessful candidate; persistent candidate
万年床: (まんねんどこ) - bedding that is never put away during the day; permanently laid-out futon
万年新造: (まんねんしんぞう) - woman of perennial youth
万年暦: (まんねんごよみ) - perpetual calendar (for reckoning lucky and unlucky days)
万年茸: (まんねんたけ) - bracket fungus (Ganoderma lucidum - formerly Fomes japonicus)
万年通宝: (まんねんつうほう) - ancient Japanese coinage first minted in 760 CE
万年青: (おもと) - Japanese rhodea (plant of the lily family); Rhodea japonica
万年青年: (まんねんせいねん) - (yoji) man of perennial youth; man who never loses his youthful vigor
万感: (ばんかん) - flood of emotions; many thoughts
万感胸に迫る: (ばんかんむねにせまる) - to be filled with thousand emotions; to be overwhelmed by a flood of emotions; to be wrought by a thousand emotions
万才: (まんざい) - two-person comedy act (usu. presented as a fast-paced dialogue, occ. presented as a skit); comic dialogue
万方: (ばんぽう) - many lands; many means
万有: (ばんゆう) - all things; all creation; universal
万有内在神論: (ばんゆうないざいしんろん) - panentheism
万有在神論: (ばんゆうざいしんろん) - panentheism
万有引力: (ばんゆういんりょく) - universal gravitation
万有引力定数: (ばんゆういんりょくていすう) - gravitational constant (G)
万止むを得ず: (ばんやむをえず) - there is no hope
万止むを得なければ: (ばんやむをえなければ) - if necessary; when unavoidable
万歳三唱: (ばんざいさんしょう) - three cheers
万死一生: (ばんしいっしょう) - (yoji) advancing in the face of death; having a narrow escape from the jaw of death
万民: (ばんみん) - all people; the whole nation
万点: (まんてん) - many points; many dots; being interspersed in countless numbers
万物: (ばんもつ) - all things; all creation
万物の霊長: (ばんぶつのれいちょう) - the lord of creation; man; mankind
万物流転: (ばんぶつるてん) - (yoji) all things are in a state of flux; everything is constantly changing
万病: (まんびょう) - all kinds of sicknesses
万病のもと: (まんびょうのもと) - the source of all kinds of diseases
万病の元: (まんびょうのもと) - the source of all kinds of diseases
万病薬: (まんびょうやく) - cure-all; panacea; heal-all
万福: (まんぷく) - all health and happiness
万緑一紅: (ばんりょくいっこう) - (yoji) one red flower standing out in a sea of green vegetation; one item of quality standing out among many; one woman among many men
万緑叢中紅一点: (ばんりょくそうちゅうこういってん) - one red flower standing out in a sea of green vegetation; one item of quality standing out among many; one woman among many men
万聖節: (ばんせいせつ) - All Saints' Day; All Hallows' Day
万能: (bannou) - all-purpose, utility, universal; all-powerful, almighty, omnipotent, all-round (ex.: atleta)
万能ねぎ: (ばんのうねぎ) - thin green spring onion shoots (esp. minced as a condiment)
万能ナイフ: (ばんのうナイフ) - all-purpose knife (e.g. Swiss Army knife); utility knife
万能ネギ: (ばんのうネギ) - thin green spring onion shoots (esp. minced as a condiment)
万能供血者: (ばんのうきょうけつしゃ) - universal blood donor (i.e. having blood-type O negative); universal donor
万能包丁: (ばんのうほうちょう) - all-purpose knife
万能汚れ落とし: (ばんのうよごれおとし) - all-purpose cleaner
万能細胞: (ばんのうさいぼう) - pluripotent cell
万能選手: (ばんのうせんしゅ) - all-around athlete
万葉仮名: (まんようがな) - (yoji) early Japanese syllabary composed of Chinese characters used phonetically
万葉調: (まんようちょう) - the poetic style typical of Manyoushuu
万葉集: (まんようしゅう) - Manyoushuu (famous 8thC poetry); Japan's oldest anthology of poems
万謝: (ばんしゃ) - many thanks; sincere apologies
万象: (ばんしょう) - all creation; all nature; all the universe
万軍: (ばんぐん) - hosts; all the armies
万軍の主: (ばんぐんのしゅ) - Lord of hosts
万遍なく: (まんべんなく) - equally; thoroughly; all over; uniformly; without exception; all around
万遍無く: (まんべんなく) - equally; thoroughly; all over; uniformly; without exception; all around
万遺漏無きを期す: (ばんいろうなきをきす) - to make absolutely sure that there are no omissions
